headerDisplay: Enter your Mitsubishi **Wi-Fi Control** app credentials to discover your units.

password.title: User Password
password.description: Password used on your Mitsubishi Wi-Fi Control app

dry.title: Enable Dry Mode (experimental)
dry.description: Dry mode is still in development and is subject to bugs.

displayHalfStep.title: Display Half Temps
displayHalfStep.description: Displays values for the current temperature in 0.5 step increments.

setHalfStep.title: Set Half Temps
setHalfStep.description: Allows you to set the desired temperature in 0.5 step increments.

zones.title: Ducted AC Zone Control
zones.description: This will allow you to control individual room/zones on your dcuted A/C via homekit. These Zone will be exposed as seperate accessories. Names will match configuration from A/C unit.

zonetype.title: Zone Device Type
zonetype.description: Select the type of accessory zones will display as in Homekit. (Fan is currently supported, could add other later ie. switch, light).
